topic.title: Monitoring a database from the Operations Console

body.p: This topic describes monitoring information available through the Operations Console.

The monitoring console can generate the following alarms:
Alarm name Metric Alarm ID Threshold
CPU Usage cpu.idle_perc 719a960f-30c7-4a7d-8bb8-8d3910353249 avg(cpu.idle_perc) < 10 times 3
Disk Inode Usage disk.inode_used_perc d71a4796-fe8c-4952-8592-bc1bc2e22503 disk.inode_used_perc > 90
Disk Usage disk.space_used_perc 7c413fae-b885-4151-95e8-f5a434f84899 disk.space_used_perc > 90
Memory Usage mem.usable_perc 59531adf-3c64-4d9e-8e06-428a926ed353 avg(mem.usable_perc) < 10 times 3
Monasca Agent Collection Time monasca.collection_time_sec ad8195ff-12e9-4907-978c-45627ea26e6b avg(monasca.collection_time_sec) > 5 times 3
Monasca Agent Emit Time monasca.emit_time_sec b47de667-c325-4be0-be24-7a45b048bfdd avg(monasca.emit_time_sec) > 2 times 3
Network Errors (In) net.in_errors_sec 464aec5f-4c16-4539-9c35-0f73ed82a074 net.in_errors_sec > 5
Network Errors (Out) net.out_errors_sec 464aec5f-4c16-4539-9c35-0f73ed82a074 net.out_errors_sec > 5
MySQL Slow Query Rate
74d459a0-724b-4937-8ef6-2f346b52d68d avg(mysql.performance.slow_queries) > 10 times 3
Process Check
4a47bf3e-90f1-43c4-a4cc-93b4ca2a12d4 process.pid_count < 1
